name: Deviled Chicken
description: With a little practice and a little added flavor, a humble chicken breast can be anything you want.
keywords: chicken, dijon mustard, shallot, dairy-free, main course

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 425. Combine 1/3 cup Dijon or coarse mustard, 1/3 cup chopped shallot and 1/4 teaspoon cayenne.
Spread this mixture over the top of the chicken before putting it in the pan.
Use any extra mustard mixture to baste the breasts; roast 10 to 15 minutes, or until just cooked through.
